text: This season, Jessie James Decker is bringing wintry Christmas vibes to sunny Nashville! “ I wanted to make sure it screamed ‘ Merry Christmas, y ’ all! ’ ” the singer and cookbook author, 30, exclusively says in the new issue of Us Weekly. At the same time, she likes to keep her house “ festive but practical, ” the mom of Vivianne, 4, Eric II, 3, and Forrest, 8 months, with husband Eric Decker notes, adding she does the same for her Christmas dinner table with Joss & Main plates. “ I love to mix holiday tableware with pieces I can use year - round. ” Watch the video above to hear more of Decker ’ s holiday tips!
